main event: An unidentified object was reported over Fort McPherson, Georgia on 10 July 1950.
interesting points: The object was reported by WOJG of the 111th CIC Detachment at approximately 1025., The object had a bright metallic appearance., It was moving at a slow speed and flying in an easterly direction., The object was observed to be small in size., It became obscured by low hanging clouds during the sighting.
